lender.name: docuvana
lender.occupational_info:
Docuvana is a web service that helps you organize your email attachments and other files, including pictures, documents, audio and video files. docuvana finds information that is buried in your email account, so that you can easily view attachments, share them with a friend, or post them on Facebook or Twitter, without exposing your computer to viruses or spyware. docuvana works with all email accounts that support IMAP or POP, including Gmail, Exchange, AT&T, Verizon, and premium versions of Yahoo and Live.
docuvana is provided by Docuvana, Inc., a privately-held California corporation.

lender.name: reggie
lender.occupational_info:
Greetings and Salutations!! I thank God I am alive, and for the opportunity to share my strength, hope and experience with you. I am blessed and highly favored. As a result of my many life experiences, I have been able to know what it is like to overcome addictions and other life threatening challenges. I am absolutely convinced that it is my duty to share those experiences honestly, as a way of encouraging others (like you) to do the same. This blog is written for all of us who are trying to experience wellness. We all have a piece of the puzzle; a part of the answer to what life is all about. Addictions are at the core of what is holding many of us hostage to our own passions and desires.
Having overcome many addictions and developing a level of discipline has given me a chance to help others do the same. That is especially useful today, when there are so many things that people are addicted to. I never would have thought that the pain and suffering I lived with as a result of my addictions to drugs and alcohol would be the very thing that would be my greatest life lesson, but that is exactly what has happened. I was diagnosed with AIDS in 1988, when there were no drugs or hope for us, and many were shunned and stigmatized. I was forced to rely on faith, hope and love and learn how to live in a way that supported wellness. Those lessons, and the research I still do to continue to grow, has given me a base of knowledge that I am compelled to share with the world!
As a matter of fact, my life has been like a movie, one in which I have been able toâ¦forced to develop many talents in order to position myself to better help to create an atmosphere that is conducive to healing. Look, itâs like this. I have been a radio and television personality, produced independent media, Iâve been an author and advocate for holistic healing solutions, including vegetarianism, and other conscious efforts to âparticipate in our own survival/salvationâ because if we are not doing so, âwe are most certainly complicit in our own demiseâ. Here we will discuss holistic healing solutions, and share honest situations that we are dealing with in our lives. We will enlighten ourselves about how to have life, and have it more abundantly! I have been resurrected and you can too. No matter what you are dealing with in your life, there is hope.
Our attitudes are the thing that we have control over, and we create our own reality with every thought. In this blog, we will create a new reality; individually, in our families, and in the world community! I have been blessed that my wife and I have spent over 25 years together and she is still HIV negative. We have reared four children, and that in itself has been quite an experience. In this blog you will find honesty and information on how to overcome whatever you are going through. You will be motivated to participate in your own salvation. You will be engaged in W.A.R â Wellness, Awareness, and Recovery. You will be loved. I thank you so much for being â and giving me a reason to be alive!! Peace & Blessings Reggie Smith.

lender.name: stepsnstitches
lender.occupational_info:
Steps n' Stitches strives to create elegant and unique, production-specific costumes for the stage, from full-scale classical dance and musical theater performances to class demonstration recitals, and everything in between.
Working closely with our clients, we deliver designs that elevate the overall production by highlighting body lines, framing movement, and capturing the spirit, ambiance and aesthetic of the performance in dress. It is our privilege to work together with company Directors, instructors, musicians and the artists themselves in a collaborative process that enhances the expression of their art.
Our primary goal is to serve our clients with a respect for their talent and insight, and to deliver the highest-quality product on time and problem-free.

We give away whatever we have freely acquired. We live and let live.
lender.occupational_info:
Our family owns the web hosting company, iDCS, http://www.idcsph.com which operates as a legitimate business in the Philippines since February 2008.
We need more capital for the business to harness its full potential and we are being limited by our suppliers because of our subscription/terms initially applied for.
We have a lot of fresh ideas in mind in how to make the business grow and become the most preferred web hosting company in the Philippines (and soon in the world) but we don't have that much resources to continually fight against the monopolizing and bureaucratic industry.
We should be able to offer the best of what we can get from online service providers given the opportunity to fully materialize our ideas into fruition.
With the current standing of our business, we get to help a few families in our neighborhood and nearby provinces we know who lacks the opportunity to enjoy the good life. We provide them help without expecting anything in return, money they need to nourish and educate themselves then to find a decent job to further improve their state of being.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are easy and fulfilling to give.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7th graders.

lender.name: emmanuel
lender.loan_because: i like to lend from kiva because i believe through lending i can be able to change my life.As ithas become so difficult for me to get a capital without lending a
lender.occupational_info: am a university student from university of DODOMA from Tanzania.Despite of being a student i use to condact agricultureactivities at home

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than me. I do not believe in a higher power, a god that condems punishes or gives, I believe that we here on earth only have each other, and that some of us are lucky enough to have the possibility to change another persons life.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I assist a company leader or executive. I organize his meetings, take his phone calls, scan/read his e-mails etc, I do everything possible for him to be able to fully focus on the core business.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing. I want to share the love of Jesus in a tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and I write articles & books.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: One person has to reach out before someone can reach back.
lender.occupational_info: Caregiver for family member at present time.
